Title: Squigmonger
Legend: The Squigmonger capers and hoots from behind his terrifying Glareface mask. Riding upon the grot-borne skull of a Cave Squig representing the immolated godbeast Boingob, he puts the fear of the Moonclan bogeyman into the Gloomspite hordes.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Squigmonger, Squigmancer, Squigcap Shaman and Squig Herder with Mini-Mangler must be taken as a set for a total of 240 points. Although taken as a set, each is a separate unit.

Intro: BATTALIONSThis warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Squigapalooza

Rules.Rule: DESCRIPTIONA Squigmonger is a single model armed with Boingob’s Tusks and Fangs.

Rules.Name: Hallucinogenic Fungus Brews
Rules.Fluff: Squigapalooza shamans drink long draughts of hallucinogenic fungus brew before the battle begins, making them almost impervious to pain. However, as the battle progresses the effects start to wear off.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES In the first battle round, this unit has a ward of 5+. In the second battle round, this unit has a ward of 6+.

Rules.Name: Bogeysquig
Rules.Fluff: The Squigmonger generates palpable waves of fear that scare nearby squigs into fighting with renewed vigour.
Rules.Rule: In your hero phase, you can make a Squigapalooza Know-wotz roll for this model. If you do so, roll a dice. On a 3+ pick 1 friendly MOONCLAN SQUIG unit wholly within 18" of this model that is visible to them. You can re-roll charge rolls and run rolls for that unit until your next hero phase.

Rules.Name: Slippery Git
Rules.Fluff: Squigapalooza shamans seek to put as many of their fellow squigs between themselves and incoming enemy fire as possible.
Rules.Rule: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target this model while it is within 3" of a friendly MOONCLAN unit with 3 or more models.
